unnormalised: Borem, tumi ek bhonvddi yojitat asa ani tumkam ek pot'to zai? LOL. Bhartantlea hotelanche pot'te sodhun kaddop hi ek sovkaryachich vostu zavnk zata, khorea bhonvdde itli umedi asteli (sovkarya itli!). Hanvem ek pavtt hotel soddun soddlem, ani mhojem vachon asa, “Opp. Hanuman Mandir, Mumbai.” Opp. Hanuman Mandir, lokancho! Mumbaiant sumar 7.4 million Hanuman mandiram asat. Tankam tenkunk pavum, dostam!
normalised: Bore, tumi ek trip plan kortat ani tumka ek address zai? L-O-L. Bharotant hotelache address sodun kaddop ek adventure asunk xakta, sumar trip-it bhag gheunakai (sumar!). Mhaka ek hotel laguiche sodun kaddpa cho prayatn kelo, ani mhaka website-iche, "Hanuman Mandirache ulate, Mumbai." Ulate Hanuman Mandir, lok! Mumbai-iche sumar saat point char million Hanuman mandir asa. Thoda kelay, dost!

unnormalised: Khoim torui aso, Bharoti pot'te koddok niyamani astolea poros tankam vicharanchim vakyanche rup dita. Tumkam ashi vostu mellonk zata "C/o Sharma Niwas, Lane No. 4, Behind Pizza Hut, Andheri (E), Mumbai, 400069." Kiteak tumi bhagyavont, tem khoreponnan Pizza Hutchea lagin asa. Pro Tip: Pizza khaupa sarko asa vo na.
normalised: Kashem-kashem, Bharoti address-iche vishay thodde suchovna, tankam ghott niyam nahi. Tumka "Sharma Niwas-ik patrak, Lane Number chaar, Pizza Hut-ache fattar, Andheri (E), Mumbai, chaar lakh ani ekunsatt" ashem mellonk xakta. Tumich lucki zale zat, tea ek Pizza Hut-ache laguiche asa. Pro Tip: Pizza khaupa jogi asunk xakta va nanka.

unnormalised: Ani to "landmark" asloleachem puraichem aspa aspa. "Vhodd banyan ruchea lagim" hem borem asa... kiteak vhodd banyan ruch fletta-overak foddun haddta. Eka dempan tumchea GPS dukhta ani tumi randmon chai wallahank vicharunk bhonvtat, "Maf korat, Hotel Magnificent *khoim* asa? Tem mhojea azoba poros vhodd aslolea ruchea lagim aslem!"
normalised: Ani thodde "landmark" sangtat. "Vhodlya batache rukhache laguiche" bore asa... jeda vostu vhodle batache rukhache uddun ek flyover kaddtat, teda vostu borem zavunk xakta. Fatafat tumchen G-P-S rudan korta ani tumi random chai wallahs-ik vicharat astai, "Mafa kortat, Hotel Magnificent kiteim asa? tankam sangtale ki tem rukhache laguiche mhaka dada-vada-iche porne zale!"

unnormalised: Hotelinchea confirmarani bhov daagteli ratnani asat. #12/3A, 1st Floor, Above Syndicate Bank, Jayanagar 5th Block, Bangalore, 560041". Atam tumchea auto-rickshaw chalokak tumkam *poilea* floorak vochunk zai, Syndicate Bankachea voir mhonn sangunk yevpacho prayatn karat. To sarke to tumchea sovem blankon tolto ani 3X normal bhattam sangtolto. Tankam foreigner + complicated pot'to = jackpot dishta.
normalised: Hotellachem confirmation kornar mhaka zaina. "Hash bara vibhag tin A, poili manjil, Syndicate Bank-ache voir, Jayanagar panchvo Block, Bangalore, panch lakh ani sath lakh ani ekuntis". Atam, tumchen auto-rickshaw driver-ik sang ki tumka poili manjil zavonk zai, Syndicate Bank-ache voir. To shayed tumka blank zala zat, ani tumka teen x normal bhadhe sangtale. Tankam videshi zale lagun complicated address jackpot zale.

unnormalised: Postal code-ak survat korunk naka. Tumkam chintunk zata 6 angka koddok ponnan sthan uktear korunk puraunk zata, borem? Chuki. Kadanch ekach rastyant don building-ache vegvegle postal code astat. Tech bharti postal seva ek bhov elaborate gupi-gupi khell khelta.
normalised: Mhaka postal code-ik chalu koronk div naka. Tumi chintat ki sathi digit ek jagek khodun kaddpa khub asa, bare? Chook. Kadachit, ekach margar don buildingak veg-vegle postal code asa. Ti Bharoti postal seva kiteam-i lukon-lukochacho khel khellat.

unnormalised: Gamvbhearponnan zaitar, Bhartant hotel sodhun kaddpacho sogleant boro marg? Tankam phone karat. Ani tanak voir phone karat. Ani sumarponnan eka local kalakaren kadlele nakshechea sovem eka carrier pigeonak dhaddat. Fokot mazak kortana (sumarponnan). Pun gamvbhearponnan konnakui ulo marat. Vistarit margdarshan zoddun ghya. Landmarak ani lagache bus stopyak. Kiteak te *suruvant* landmarkachea lagin asat mhonn vicharat (banyan rucha sithati azunui mhaka ghambarta).
normalised: Satya, Bharotant ek hotell sodun kaddpaacho borek marg? Tankam phone kar. Ani magir tankam portun phone kar. Ani shayed ek local artist-an ukhallile ek map ghalun carrier pigeon dhadd. Mazak kortam (thodde). Satya mhunnle zalar, konak zavunk dhag. Detailed directions ghe. Landmarks ani laguichich bus stops. Te kadache chalik landmarks-ache laguiche asa mhunn vichar (batache rukhache situation mhaka dukheta).

unnormalised: Ani Google Maps *street view* tumi vochche adim check karat. Zaga asun asa mhonn pola. Hanvem ek pavtt "luxury resort" book kelem ani tem bricks ani ek bhov umedi bhov bhavishayvadi sainya disle. Shikovn zoddli.
normalised: Tumchea zanka zaiche adhi, Google Maps street view-ik chok kar. Jagek aai asa tumi dekhi. Mhaka kadhi "luxury resort" book kelo ki to eka vitanche dher ani khushi-iche suchnovn zale. Shikpa.

unnormalised: Ani Bharti bhonvddecho sunheri niyom yaad dovrat: dhir tumcho dost asa. Ani borea kallzacho anubhav tumchem ut'tom hathyar asa. Sukhi yatrik. Ani tumchem hotel *khoreponnan* confirmation emailan sangta toshiche sthan asonk divo (pun pon bet korunk naka). Tumkam tea kallzachi garaz asa. Borem naseeb #420, Funky Street, Opposite Dominos, Delhi, 110001" sodun kaddunk.
normalised: Ani Bharati zanka zaiche golden niyam dhar: Dhir tumcho ixt asa. Ani ek borem haspaacho sense tumchen uttam hatyaar asa. Khushal zanka zavunk! Ani tumchem hotel thik tumchea confirmation email-ik sangit asa (tumich bet laynkaka). Tumich tea haspaacho zaron padta. Khub khushal "hash char lakh ani vis, Funky Street, Ulate Dominos, Delhi, ek lakh ani dha lakh ani ek" sodun kaddunk.
